titles.title: A bill to approve the transfer of Yellow Creek Port properties in Iuka, Mississippi.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer without amendment. With written report No. 112-243.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 558.

bill.summary: 11/30/2012--Reported to Senate without amendment. Approves the conveyance by the Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA) to the state of Mississippi of the federally-owned Yellow Creek Port properties in the custody of the TVA at Iuka, Mississippi.
